Name: Outatime
About the game: Those boards don't work on water! Outatime is a futuristic multiplayer hoverboard racing game. Lean-to-move system designed from the ground up for VR. Race against the clock and other hoverboarders in a futuristic setting. Will you claim victory, complete the race, or be out of time?... Outatime is currently early in development and has a limited amount of content. More levels and features are planned but we are taking on community feedback. If you have any suggestions, feel free to join or Disord and share your ideas! Outatime supports LIV mixed reality capture and is cross-play compatible with the standalone Quest version available on AppLab.
